sen.j: 年男（としおとこ）は日本の風習の一つ。
sen.e: "Toshi-otoko" means a man playing some roles in Japanese customs.
"Toshi-otoko" (literally means a man of the year) is one of the Japanese customs.

sen.j: 年男（としおとこ） 正月を中心とした家族行事の主役を務める男性をさす。
sen.e: Toshi-otoko means a man who plays the leading role in family events such as the New Year festival.

Toshi-otoko means a man who plays the leading role in family events such as the New Year festival.

sen.j: 特に正月に限っては、一家の行事すべてを「年男」が取り仕切り行い、正月が近づいた暮れの大掃除をはじめ、正月の飾りつけ、元旦の水汲み、年神の供物をととのえたり、御節料理の準備など一切を取り仕切った。
sen.e: Especially, as far as the New Year festival event is concerned, toshi-otoko presides the event by directing all particulars such as the end-of-year general cleaning, the New Year decorations, preparation of water supply on the New Year's day, offerings for "toshigami" (the god of the incoming year), and "osechi" food (special food for the New Year).

Especially, as far as the New Year festival event is concerned, toshi-otoko presides the event by directing all particulars such as the year-end cleaning, the New Year decorations, water drawing on the New Year's day, offerings for "toshigami" (the god of the incoming year), and "osechi" food (special food for the New Year).

sen.j: かつて、「年男」は室町幕府や江戸幕府では、古い儀式に通じた者が任じられていたが、一般の家では、主として家の家長がその任にあたり、次第に長子や奉公人、若い男性が当たるようになった。
sen.e: In the old times, the governments of the Muromachi shogunate and the Edo shogunate used to appoint a man well versed in old rituals as toshi-otoko while in ordinary households, the head of a family used to take on the role, which gradually shifted to the eldest son, a servant or a young man.

In the old times, the Muromachi bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) and the Edo bakufu used to appoint a man well versed in old rituals as toshi-otoko while in ordinary households, the head of a family used to take on the role, which gradually shifted to the eldest son, a servant or a young man.

sen.j: 年男（としおとこ） その年の干支に当たる男性のことをさして呼ぶ。
sen.e: Toshi-otoko also means men who were born in the year of the same zodiac sign (symbolic animal) with that of the current year.

sen.j: かつては「年男」が地域での節分の豆まき役となっていた。
sen.e: In the past, toshi-otoko men play the role of throwing beans in their regions at the Setsubun festival (celebration of the coming of spring).
